item.title: Perfection
item.description: Startign with nmap the website dashboard checked the wappalyzer to find the technologies website is using but couldn’t find any I tried directory fuzzing Found this at the bottom of the website we got another info that susan is sysadmin we can see this in the about us and there might me a vulnerability on secure coding there is a input field in the website , there might be a input validation vulnerbility
